author: Kate Letterick
title: New COVID-19 testing drive-thru opens in Moncton Coliseum
description: A new COVID-19 assessment centre will give Horizon Health the ability to increase the number of tests done in the Moncton region.
content:
A new COVID-19 assessment centre will give Horizon Health the ability to increase the number of tests done in the Moncton region.
The outdoor, drive-thru testing centre that was located in a Moncton Hospital parking lot has closed, and one of the agrenas at … [+3479 chars]
